examples.example: 我递给朋友一瓶水，让他在口渴时能及时解渴。

translate.english: I handed a bottle of water to my friend so that he can quench his thirst in time when he is thirsty.

examples.example: 我买了一瓶饮料，和朋友一起分享这份快乐。

translate.english: I bought a bottle of drink and shared this happiness with friends.

examples.example: 我在路边捡到一瓶花，那美丽的样子让人心情愉悦。

translate.english: I picked up a bottle of flowers by the roadside, and its beautiful appearance makes people feel happy.
